name: Necro Defense
description: The warriors have come to your roost. Summoning and placing a skeleton Guard the dungeon from the endless crowds. Strategic deployment and quick judgment I will protect you from the warriors.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-6700 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1070 Storage: 4 GB available space
